top_stories.title: Here are the 33 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2025
top_stories.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak
top_stories.content: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

top_stories.title: Sliding Calculations of Risks of Federal Reserve Rate Cuts
top_stories.description: Bank of America cautioned that the Federal Reserve risks making a policy error if it starts cutting rates next month. They indicated that economic activity has increased after a slowdown in the first half of the year, and if that is accurate, the labor market is likely to recover as ... Continue reading: Sliding Calculations of Risks of Federal Reserve Rate Cuts
top_stories.author: Selcuk Disci
top_stories.content: Bank of America cautioned that the Federal Reserve risks making a policy error if it starts cutting rates next month. They indicated that economic activity has increased after a slowdown in the first half of the year, and if that is accurate, the labor market is likely to recover as ... top_stories.title: Cornell  researchers build first ‘microwave brain’ on a chip
top_stories.description: Cornell engineers have built the first fully integrated “microwave brain” — a silicon microchip that can process ultrafast data and wireless signals at the same time, while using less than 200 milliwatts of power. Instead of digital steps, it uses analog microwave physics for real-time computations like radar tracking, signal decoding, and anomaly detection. This unique neural network design bypasses traditional processing bottlenecks, achieving high accuracy without the extra circuitry or...
top_stories.content: Cornell engineers have built the first fully integrated “microwave brain” — a silicon microchip that can process ultrafast data and wireless signals at the same time, while using less than 200 milliwatts of power. Instead of digital steps, it uses analog microwave physics for real-time computations like radar tracking, signal decoding, and anomaly detection. This unique neural network design bypasses traditional processing bottlenecks, achieving high accuracy without the extra circuitry or...

top_stories.title: Principles for Assumptions Generation in Enthymeme-Based Dialogue
top_stories.description: In enthymeme-based dialogues, involved participants create assumptions in order to decode arguments from the exchanged enthymemes. This work introduces the concept of assumptions operator, which formalizes the mechanism for generating these assumptions, and proposes a set of principles to guide the construction of these operators. Said principles are inspired by Grice’s Maxims of Conversation, as well as Govier’s ARG conditions for cogent arguments. Then, in order to analyze how the used...
top_stories.author: Diego S. Orbe Leiva, Alejandro J. Garcia, Sebastian Gottifredi
top_stories.content: In enthymeme-based dialogues, involved participants create assumptions in order to decode arguments from the exchanged enthymemes. This work introduces the concept of assumptions operator, which formalizes the mechanism for generating these assumptions, and proposes a set of principles to guide the construction of these operators. Said principles are inspired by Grice’s Maxims of Conversation, as well as Govier’s ARG conditions for cogent arguments. Then, in order to analyze how the used...

top_stories.title: Revolutionizing warehouse automation with scientific simulation
top_stories.description: With a novel parallel-computing architecture, a CAD-to-USD pipeline, and the use of OpenUSD as ground truth, a new simulator can explore hundreds of sensor configurations in the time it takes to test just a few physical setups.
top_stories.author: Deniz Akyildiz
top_stories.content: With a novel parallel-computing architecture, a CAD-to-USD pipeline, and the use of OpenUSD as ground truth, a new simulator can explore hundreds of sensor configurations in the time it takes to test just a few physical setups.
